name: ChickenFly - Godot Wild Jam 31
description:
Try to go as far as possible.


Controls:

Launching:

  • Press and released space to choose launch direction
  • Press one more time for launch power

Fly

  • Space to flap. Up to three times. Can refill with a wing pickup
  • Enter to activate rocket if you bought one

You can buy some items from the shop after each run:

  • Wings tip for stronger flap
  • Rocket (Enter to activate) provides a boost
  • Helmet will prevent being captured by the cage one time

Upgrade your cannon to get a stronger start

All assets by me except the two background music:

https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles cynicmusic.com pixelsphere.org
